mapper.sql: record_id, user_id, task_id, cumulative, award_type, award_amount, award_time, validity_time, whether_cash, prize_time

record_id,

mapper.update:
update signin_award_record
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cumulative = #{cumulative,jdbcType=INTEGER},
award_type = #{awardType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
award_amount = #{awardAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
award_time = #{awardTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
validity_time = #{validityTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
whether_cash = #{whetherCash,jdbcType=INTEGER},
prize_time = #{prizeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update signin_award_record set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cumulative = #{cumulative,jdbcType=INTEGER}, award_type = #{awardType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, award_amount = #{awardAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, award_time = #{awardTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, validity_time = #{validityTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, whether_cash = #{whetherCash,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prize_time = #{prizeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select task_name from signin_month_task where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1

select count(*) from signin_award_record left join user_copy user on user.user_id=signin_award_record.user_id
where ${where}
